name: Eric Ken Shinseki
order: United States Secretary of Veterans Affairs

unit: Medical Corps |commands= Army Chief of Staff, 1st Cavalry Division, 3rd Infantry Division, Seventh United States Army,  Allied Land Forces Central Europe (General), NATO Stabilization Force in Bosnia-Herzegovina
